item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis with Diamonds
item.description: For this post I decided to walk through the steps of exploratory data analysis using the diamonds dataset that come with base R. Plotting the Data data('diamonds') #Loading the dataset summary(diamonds) #Looking at the summary of the dataset ## carat cut color clarity ## Min. :0.2000 Fair : 1610 D: 6775 SI1 :13065 ## 1st Qu.:0.4000 Good : 4906 E: 9797 VS2 :12258 ## Median :0.7000 Very Good:12082 F: 9542 SI2 : 9194 ## Mean :0.
